埍字的基本解释

埍
juǎn
古代服劳役的人住的土房。
女牢房。
古代地方基层政权所属的牢房。

埍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juǎn］
［《廣韻》姑泫切，上銑，見。］
［《廣韻》胡畎切，上銑，匣。］
犹牢狱。

埍字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　埍； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页229第31
【廣韻】【集韻】?乎?切，音泫。【說文】徒隸所居也。　又【集韻】一曰女牢。　又一曰亭部。　又【廣韻】姑泫切【集韻】【類篇】古泫切，?音畎。義同。

埍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
埍字的起名意思

暂无。

Xian
Basic explanation of words
Xian
juǎn
The earthen house where the laborers lived in ancient times.
Women's cell.
A cell belonging to the ancient local government at the grassroots level.
Xian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［juǎn］
["Guangyun" Gu Xun cut, milled up, see you. ]
["Guangyun" Hu Dian cut, milled, box. ]
Still in prison.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　埍; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 229 31
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Almost? Cut, Yin Xuan. [Said the text] Tuli also lives.　[Jiyun] One said the female prison.　Another one said the pavilion.　 [Guang Yun] Gu Xuan cut [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter] Gu Xuan cut,? Yin Dian. The same meaning.
